channel.title: Guitar covers
channel.description:
Hey all you guitar players out there, post some songs that you are currently working on! Here's what I'm working on:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6k3l3bku4E8[/youtube]
P.S. I'm not a huge fan of dubsteb but, I just couldn't resist after watching this guy play it :D

item.title: Guitar covers
item.dc:creator: @zzjimmy zzjimmy
item.description:
@zzjimmy wrote:

Not really but, If you want to play again, I recommend searching “how to read guitar tabs” on google. It’s very easy and after you succesfully learn it, search up: ultimate guitar on google and use that web site to search up any song that you would like to play and it will give you the required tabs for the song. I’m also self taught and I used be really bad but, after practicing every day, it became second nature

Read full topic

item.title: Guitar covers
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I haven’t played the guitar since I was a little child. Is there a online tutorial or something?
